text:
Legend has it that celebrities are just like us, and watching Busy Philipps dye Michelle Williams' hair pink, well, let's just say we're starting to buy into that idea a little more. On Wednesday night the real-life best friends recorded the whole night for Instagram, and it's impossible to look away.

The action began while the duo and a friend were staying up for a flight back to L.A. from Paris. After going out, they were back in a hotel room (with white wine) when the pink-haired Philipps whipped out her leave-in hair tint. "Guys, we're going to dye her hair pink. What do you think? Is this a good idea? Look at that hair. It's going to be pink," Philipps explained to the camera.

Instagram / @busyphilipps

Philipps says she uses the tint for 20 minutes to get her pink color, so they decided to put it into Williams' platinum pixie for five minutes. The goal: "perfectly millennial pink" hair. Philipps massaged it in; Williams' face is, in a word, incredible. In two words, incredible and relatable.

Instagram / @busyphilipps

Five minutes of wine time later, and Williams' was freshly pink.
title: Busy Philipps Just Dyed Michelle Williams' Hair Pink on Instagram

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: While killing time in Paris, Busy Philipps and Michelle Williams decided to drink some wine and involve hair dye.

og.description: And it actually turned out well.
og.title: Busy Philipps Just Dyed Michelle Williams' Hair Pink on Instagram

twitter.title: Busy Philipps Just Dyed Michelle Williams' Hair Pink on Instagram
